name: Mount Everest Base Camp
remarks: World-famous trekking destination; highest mountain base camp in the world.

name: Annapurna Base Camp
remarks: Stunning views of Annapurna range; popular for moderate-level trekkers.

name: Pashupatinath Temple
remarks: Sacred Hindu Temple; UNESCO World Heritage Site.

name: Boudhanath Stupa
remarks: One of the largest stupas in the world; peaceful and spiritual.

name: Swayambhunath
remarks: Buddhist stupa with great city views; lots of monkeys.

name: Rara Lake
remarks: Nepal's largest lake; remote and serene
